meanings.definition: Ochlocrats: a group of people who govern or rule by mob or mob rule.
meanings.sent1: The ochlocrats gathered in the square, shouting and causing chaos.
meanings.sent2: The city fell into disarray under the rule of the ochlocrats.
meanings.sent3: The ochlocrats tried to pass a law making ice cream mandatory on Mondays.
meanings.sent4: The ochlocrats' decisions were as unpredictable as the weather.
meanings.sent5: The image of the ochlocrats ruling with an iron fist was etched in everyone's minds.
